title:
Add a new organization to ROR: 
 
Centro Nacional de Investigaciones de Café (Cenicafé)
body:
Summary of request: Add a new organization to ROR

Name of organization: 
ROR ID: 
Which part of the record needs to be changed? 
Description of change: 

Name of organization: Centro Nacional de Investigaciones de Café (Cenicafé)
Website: https://www.cenicafe.org/es/index.php
Link to publications: https://publicaciones.cenicafe.org/
Organization type: Nonprofit (A non-profit and non-governmental organization involved in conducting or funding research)
Wikipedia page: 
Wikidata ID: Q21511954
ISNI ID: 
GRID ID: 
Crossref Funder ID: 
Other names for the organization: National Coffee Research Center (Cenicafé)
Acronym/abbreviation: Cenicafé
Related organizations: Colombian Coffee Growers Federation (FNC)
City: Manizales Colombia
Country: Colombia
Year established: 1938
How will a ROR ID for this organization be used? To identify affiliations for research publications, To acknowledge research funders, To acknowledge a research facility, To be integrated in a scholarly publishing system
Other information about this request: This institution is part of the great family of the Colombian Coffee Growers Federation (FNC). Since its creation it has led technological advances in coffee, research and appropriate, competitive and sustainable knowledge to improve coffee production and thus contribute to Colombian coffee growers’ well-being.

The Cenicafé team is made up of professionals with doctorates (PhD’s) and master’s degrees (MSc’s) in different scientific disciplines. Under the guidance of Cenicafé researchers, students from different Colombian universities work on their professional thesis, and special projects are executed with the participation of researchers from other institutions.
comments:
adambuttrick
01/25/2022, 15:42:31 | 01/25/2022, 15:46:18
comment_text: This appears to be an organization that is involved in conducting and publishing research related to the agriculture and production of coffee. It is not already in ROR. It is in scope for ROR because it:

- is an established organization
- is a top-level organization and not a subsidiary unit
- is associated with research publications and/or other activities:

research publications: https://publicaciones.cenicafe.org/index.php/avances_tecnicos/article/download/100/67 ; https://publicaciones.cenicafe.org/index.php/cenicafe/article/download/73/54

google_scholar_affiliation_usage: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=-PEXZNIAAAAJ ; https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=2wYLttcAAAAJ ; https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=iR-1qA0AAAAJ

orcid_affiliation_usage: https://orcid.org/0000-0003-4861-9649 ; https://orcid.org/0000-0003-1576-2297 ; https://orcid.org/0000-0001-9433-6979 ; https://orcid.org/0000-0003-1967-0859 ; https://orcid.org/0000-0001-9690-1660 ; https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1639-1988 ; https://orcid.org/0000-0002-3536-0386 ; https://orcid.org/0000-0001-9875-9426 ; https://orcid.org/0000-0002-4446-9797 ; https://orcid.org/0000-0002-2029-8946 ; https://orcid.org/0000-0001-9465-3237 ; https://orcid.org/0000-0002-6031-3709 ; https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0946-9951

title:
Add a new organization to ROR: 
 
SPL L'Eau des Collines
body:
Summary of request: Add a new organization to ROR

Name of organization: SPL L'Eau des Collines
Website: http://www.eaudescollines.fr/
Link to publications: http://www.eaudescollines.fr/publications-spl-eau-des-collines/partage-de-nos-connaissances/
Organization type: Company (A private for-profit corporate entity involved in conducting or sponsoring research)
Wikipedia page: 
Wikidata ID: 
ISNI ID: 
GRID ID: 
Crossref Funder ID: 
Other names for the organization: L'Eau des Collines
Aliases: L'Eau des Collines
Acronym/abbreviation: SPL EDC
Related organizations: 
City: Aubagne
Country: France
Geonames ID: 3036433
Year established: 2012
How will a ROR ID for this organization be used? To identify affiliations for research publications, To identify affiliations for datasets, To acknowledge research funders, To acknowledge a research facility, To be integrated in a scholarly publishing system
Other information about this request: SPL L'Eau des Collines was driving field work and was providing data for supporting academic research work in the fied of the subsurface hydrology. Recent publication in international peer-reviewed journal aknowledged our contribution as data provider  https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007%2Fs10040-021-02426-9#Ack1 . The present request to be indexed in ROR.org is for supporting open-access of all our scientific data and  reports  with a systematic registration of our numeric ressources in Datacite (each of our data will be indexed with a DOI through OPIDOR service provided by CNRS). We need to be recorded in ROR.org in order to be able to affiliate our DOIs ressources.
comments:
adambuttrick
01/28/2022, 00:47:56 | 01/28/2022, 00:52:16
comment_text: Public water company in charge of water management and related services in the Pays d'Aubagne et de l'Étoile territory of France. Provides datasets and produces reports on the related to the resources under their charge (e.g., https://doi.org/10.48799). I can't find them yet on Datacite, so I believe the request for a ROR ID may be part of their move to the platform.

Not certain whether to use the form provided for the primary name. Mailing address on their site simply list "L’eau des collines." I believe SPL is an abbreviation for "Société publique locale du pays d'Aubagne et de l'Etoile."

Similar records in ROR: https://ror.org/03v275937 ; https://ror.org/01r7sqp31

comment_text: _How will a ROR ID for this organization be used?_ UMU is one of the [DiSSCo-NL partners](https://www.dissco.eu/nl/) that wants to mobilize their geological data to both GBIF and [GeoCASe](https://www.dissco.eu/nl/). At the level of DiSSCo ROR IDs are identified as institutional IDs, hence the request.

comments:
nlundvick
01/29/2022, 18:36:35 | 01/29/2022, 18:36:35
comment_text: Added acronym/abbreviation "SIR." This organization is involved in materials science research using neutron techniques. The organization is well-established, founded in 1997. I found multiple affiliation use cases - see http://www.roganteengineering.it/pubblicazioni.asp. I can see a case being made for adding this organization to ROR. My one concern is that there appears to only be a single individual (Dr. Massimo Rogante) associated with the organization.

Labels: Державна установа “Інститут економіки та прогнозування НАН України”*Ukrainian, Государс твенное учреждение “Институт экономики и прогнозирования НАН Украины”*Russsian
Acronym/abbreviation: 
Related organizations: National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine https://ror.org/00je4t102 (parent)
City: Kyiv
Country: Ukraine
Year established: 1997
Geonames ID: 703448
How will a ROR ID for this organization be used? To identify affiliations for research publications, To identify affiliations for datasets, To acknowledge research funders, To acknowledge a research facility, To be integrated in a scholarly publishing system

Other information about this request: State Institution “Institute for  Economics and Forecasting,  National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine”, in accordance with Decree by Presidium of NAS of Ukraine of 06.07.2005 No 139 “On the renaming Institute for Economic Forecasting, of NAS of Ukraine” is successor Institute for Economic Forecasting, of NAS of Ukraine which was created in accordance with Decree by Ukraine’s Cabinet of Ministers of 19.07.1997. No772 “On the creation of the Institute for Economic Forecasting, Ukrainian National Academy of Sciences” and the corresponding Decree by the Presidium of Ukrainian National Academy of Sciences of 05.09.1997 No 298 in order to provide the elaboration of strategic forecasts and programs of Ukraine’s socio-economic development.
The Head of the Institute Is Academician of NAS of Ukraine Valeriy Mykhailovych HEYETS.
The Institute’s main objective is conducting fundamental and applied researches on the following guidelines: economic theory; modeling and forecasting economic development; monetary relations; public finances; finances of the real sector; economic growth and economic restructuring; economics and organization of high technologies; development of production infrastructure; industrial policy; technological forecasting and innovation policy; sectoral forecasting and market conjuncture; economics and policy of agrarian transformations; forma and methods of economic management in the agro-industrial complex; monitoring-based research on socio-economic transformations of the Ukrainian society; economic history; socio-economic problems of labor; economics management; spatial economic development and local government. On that basis, the Institute is developing the guidelines and methods of the development of the economic system, strategic forecasts and programs of the development of Ukraine’s economy.

adambuttrick

comment_text: Not certain this repository is sufficiently independent organization, as it is clearly under the Pacific Northwest National Laboratory (https://ror.org/05h992307). I see very few similar records in ROR. The two that we do include (https://ror.org/00x6h5n95 ; https://ror.org/014trz974) are more distinctly independent entities. They would most likely use the Pacific Northwest National Laboratory ID for their data deposits and other contributors could likewise use their own ROR IDs.

comments:
adambuttrick
02/13/2022, 19:19:20 | 02/13/2022, 19:26:48
comment_text: Not certain we should process this as a simple name change. According to Wikipedia, the company was split into two different entities in 2015:

"In August 2015, JDSU split into two different companies: [Viavi Solutions](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Viavi_Solutions) and [Lumentum Holdings](https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Lumentum_Holdings&action=edit&redlink=1)[](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JDSU#cite_note-3)."

So, we should probably process this as a new record and deprecation request, as well as possible deprecating the non-US records. While they list foreign offices on their site, it's not clear to me that these still constitute independent, top-level entities. The "Office Locations" section of their site list a single corporate headquarters and the sales, manufacturing, and research and development facilities.
